EZRegex.title: EZRegex
EZRegex.subtitle: {ezregex_icon} ezregex.org | {pypi_icon} pypi.org/project/ezregex
bullets: Developed EZRegex from scratch, a Python library that greatly simplifies Regular Expression syntax
Includes a web frontend which hosts a suite of tools to aid the development of Regular Expressions
Has a fully open-sourced Python package published on PyPi.org

Senior Project.title: Senior Project
Senior Project.subtitle: Custom Machine Learning Environment and Algorithms
bullets: Designed a custom gym environment from scratch to attempt to solve the Square Packing problem
Wrote 2 custom algorithms, using ML and simulated annealing to attempt to find a better configuration than the best-known configuration for N=11 squares

GeoDoodle.title: GeoDoodle
GeoDoodle.subtitle: {geodoodle_icon} smartycope.org/geodoodle | {github_icon2} github.com/smartycope/geodoodle
bullets: Developed a web app allowing users to create unique patterns on a graph paper-like interface
Designed an intuitive frontend with features like drawing, repeating, and seamless pattern export

Color Shifting LED.title: Color Shifting LED
Color Shifting LED.subtitle: Class project
bullets: Implemented a finite state machine in Verilog to implement a smooth color-shifting RGB LED
Simulated output using industry simulation software, then flashed an FPGA and connected it to a DAC via SPI

Client Work.title: Client Work
Client Work.subtitle: Custom Report and Graphs for Client
bullets: Wrangled data from multiple sources, including the US Census and the ACS, using R, Python, and Streamlit to create a custom report for a paying client

Building Predictions.title: Building Predictions
Building Predictions.subtitle: Team Data Science & Machine Learning Project
bullets: Worked with a team over several months to aggregate multiple datasets across several platforms and APIs
Used ML to predict by county where the next Latter-Day Saint temple will be placed

AntAI.title: AntAI
AntAI.subtitle: Custom Machine Learning Environment and Algorithms
bullets: Designed and built a simulated game environment from scratch in Python in order to use TensorFlow to create a deep reinforcement learning model to complete it
Designed and built an evolutionary algorithm from scratch to use simulated annealing to solve it

Self-Balancing Robot.title: Self-Balancing Robot
Self-Balancing Robot.subtitle: Class Project
bullets: Built a robot using a Raspberry Pi and programmed it to balance on two wheels using PID control algorithms
Later rewrote the entire codebase to enable the robot to balance using reinforcement learning instead

Door Alarm.title: Door Alarm
Door Alarm.subtitle: Class/Personal Project
bullets: Programmed a TI MSP-EXP432 launchpad board using FreeRTOS to communicate serially to an Arduino to read from a micro SD card to play a random sound clip whenever a door sensor was triggered
Later remade the entire project using a Raspberry Pi with a web interface and additional sensors

Acer.title: Acer Service Corporation
Acer.subtitle: Certified Repair Technician
bullets: Fixed iRobot Roombas, diagnosing problems, debugging firmware, and writing detailed reports
Wrote custom software to streamline my daily workflow, increasing efficiency by more than 30%
Communicate effectively with clients while efficiently managing data between several internal platforms

Accendero.title: Accendero Software
Accendero.subtitle: Software Engineering Intern
bullets: Worked as part of a team of engineers to develop both the frontend and backend of a research-oriented pharmaceutical software suite for clients
Developed a complex Python Django API framework and successfully tested it to meet client requirements
Developed and tested a large React TypeScript web application using CI/CD to maintain client satisfaction

Outlier.title: Outlier AI
Outlier.subtitle: AI Trainer
bullets: Trained and fine-tuned Large Language Models (LLMs) to perform advanced programming tasks, including code debugging, generation, and iterative improvement
Leveraged expertise in Python and JavaScript to enhance model accuracy and ensure high-quality response generation across multiple projects

soft_skills.Quick Learner: At Accendero, I went from never having written a line of JavaScript to contributing helpful commits in a single week
soft_skills.Trainable: At Acer, before my training period was even over I had surpassed all of my coworkers and was handed off several of my manager's responsibilities
soft_skills.Communication: Even as head of IT for an assisted living center, I was able to communicate technical issues effectively
soft_skills.Technical Writing: At Acer, I wrote dozens of reports daily describing exactly what was done in the repair
soft_skills.Honesty: Though I am proficient at using AI, all of the projects above were written without the aid of AI
